articles.author: NDTV Sports Desk
articles.title: How Much Prize Money D Gukesh Won After Becoming Youngest World Chess Champion - NDTV Sports
articles.description: India's D Gukesh created history on Thursday as he became the youngest world chess champion.
articles.content: India's D Gukesh created history on Thursday as he became the youngest world chess champion. Gukesh edged past the defending champion Ding Liren 7.5-6.5 by winning the 14th and last classical game of… [+1774 chars]
